title.narrative: The American Soybean Association's World Initaitive for Soy in Human Health (ASA/WISHH)

description.narrative: ASA/WISHH will increase agricultrual productivity in the poultry value chain by increasing the quantity and lowering the cost of poultry feed through the reduction of post-harvest loss and procurement inefficiencies of primary feed ingredients; Increase agricultrual productivity in the poultry sector by improving poultry feed quality through the improvement of feed testing capacity and the demonstration of the benefits of quality feed; Increase trade of eggs through awareness campaigns and the trade of commercialized poultry feed through improved distribution networks and marketing.

Capacity Building: Increased Efficiency in the procurement of feed ingredients; Adoption of improved poutry feed; capacity building: increased feed testing capacity; Organize national awareness campaign to promote egg consumption;

participating-org.narrative: Adventist Development and Relief Agency International (ADRA International)

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity

organisation.narrative: Adventist Development and Relief Agency International (ADRA International)
